txt.en: Tower of Orthanc: Saruman's Ring -- Tier 2

You now know that Saruman himself wields the master of the five you took from his lieutenants. The only hope you have to destroy his ring, is to turn the others against it.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 upon the Pinnacle of Orthanc in the Tower of Orthanc Raid.</rgb>
